About Me

My name is Nicolaos Skimas and I'm a web developer. I've been fascinated with technology and what we can create with it since I was young. Over the years I developed a passion for interface design and web development, creating intuitive projects that help people. I also love development because I'm constantly able to learn and grow, expanding my skillset by working with new tools and languages.

I was born and raised in Vancouver Washington and love living in the Pacific Northwest. I enjoy spending my free time playing sports, doing outdoor activities, and spending time with my family. I'm also a big Star Wars fan.

Most importantly, I am a Christian. I understand that apart from God I am a sinful human being, unable to fix myself. But because of God's great grace and the sacrifice of Jesus' death and resurection I am forgiven, free, and have new life in him.
